edu.cuny.ai.learning
Interface MimicryLearner

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, ContinuousLearner, Learner, Prototypeable, Resetable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AveragingLearner, ReverseDiscountSlidingLearner, SlidingWindowLearner, SortedSlidingWindowLearner, WidrowHoffLearner, WidrowHoffLearnerWithMomentum
public interface MimicryLearner
extends ContinuousLearner, Prototypeable

A learner that attempts to adjust its output to match a training signal.
